levels.description:
Immediately summons <@ba.vup>{max_cnt}</> Revenant's Shadow(s) in attack range (up to 3 at a time, they remain after skill expires). ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Attack Interval is <@ba.vdown>greatly increased</>. Attacks deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale_3:0%}</> ATK. Splash area is <@ba.vup>greatly increased</>. Talent 1 trigger chance is increased to <@ba.vup>{attack@prob:0%}</>.
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants {attack@trigger_time} ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
